name: FarmTab Products Shortcode
author: FarmersTable LLC, FarmTab

sections.description:
FarmTab Products Shortcode is a simple plugin that allows you to display FarmTab products on your WordPress site using a shortcode. The plugin generates an iframe to display your product dashboard from FarmTab.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. See the License URI for more details.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the farmtab-products-shortcode folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the ‘FarmTab Products’ menu in the WordPress admin dashboard to configure the plugin.
  4. Enter your FarmTab extension(s) to generate the shortcode(s).
  5. Use the generated shortcode(s) in your posts or pages to display the product dashboard.
sections.faq:
How do I generate the shortcode?

Go to the ‘FarmTab Products’ menu in the WordPress admin dashboard and enter your FarmTab extension(s). The plugin will generate the shortcode(s) for you.

Can I display multiple product dashboards?

Yes, you can enter multiple extensions, each on a new line, to generate multiple shortcodes.
